overview:
TADASoft manufacture Restorepoint, the affordable solution for backing up & restoring your multi-vendor network devices.

Restorepoint is an integrated hardware and software solution for Network Administrators, which makes it easy to automatically backup and store the configuration of your network devices and to restore it when needed. This is managed from one convenient central location with an easy to use web interface. Restorepoint is the only vendor independent appliance on the market and the first product to address this commonly overlooked issue.

TADASoft currently provide the RSP & MSP solutions.

Restorepoint RSP - designed for end user networks where the Restorepoint RSP solution will backup & restore configurations from supported multi-vendor devices.

Restorepoint MSP - The Restorepoint MSP appliance is designed for capacity and reliability. With very large redundant, hot-swappable internal storage and redundant hot-swappable power supply, the Restorepoint MSP is aimed at Service Providers and will support up to 10,000 devices. With the new role-based administration, Service Providers can configure separate administration domains for each of their customers, and give each customer visibility of the configurations of their own devices, audit logs, or even the ability of perform backups and restores.
